channel:
<%- resource.title %> <%- resource.description %> http://blog.joeyguerra.com/index.rss <%- new Date(resource.posts.lastBuildDate)%> <%- new Date(resource.posts.lastBuildDate)%> 1800 <% resource.posts.forEach(function(post){%>
<%- post.title%> <%- post.summary %> <%- post.slug %> <%- post.key %> <%- new Date(post.time)%>
<%})%>
